subject: CBSNews.com News Alert! Former White House Aide "Scooter" Libby Gets 30 Months
body:
Former White House Aide I. Lewis "Scooter" Libby has been sentenced to 30 
months in prison on perjury charges related to the CIA leak case.

Log on now to www.cbsnews.com, or wap.cbsnews.com for wireless users, for details. 

Wireless photo and video alerts from CBSNews.com, direct to your phone. Subscribe now at http://www.cbsnews.com/htdocs/wireless/index.php.
